short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: auto grade stars on FPT Edu Next

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Support fast grading groupmates on https://fu-edunext.fpt.edu.vn/
- Define number of stars to grade everyone
- Random number of stars for everyone

How to use?
Step 1: Add to Chrome
Step 2: Refresh Edu Next
Step 3: Click on Class > Slot > CQ > Grade On Groupmate
